book.energizedpower.front.cover.text: This is the guide book for this mod!
book.energizedpower.page.0: This is a test text value!
tooltip.energizedpower.cable_insulator.t: This item can be crafted by clicking on a wool block with shears.
tooltip.energizedpower.inventory_coal_en: Activation status can be changed by using this item on air
If active items will be taken from the inventory but not from the hotbar.
tooltip.energizedpower.energy_analyzer.t: Click on an energy block to retrieve information.
txt.energizedpower.energy_analyzer.no_en: The Energy Analyzer has not enough power (%s are required).
txt.energizedpower.energy_analyzer.no_bl: This block is no energy block.
txt.energizedpower.energy_analyzer.no_en: This block is no (FE) energy block.
tooltip.energizedpower.charger.item_ener: This item needs %s to be fully charged.
tooltip.energizedpower.charger.txt.shift: The charger can be used to craft energized copper ingots.
tooltip.energizedpower.cable.txt.shift.2: Cable insulators can be crafted by clicking on a wool block with shears.
tooltip.energizedpower.solar_panel.txt.s: This block produces %s/t during the day.
The efficiency depends on the current time
tooltip.energizedpower.coal_engine.txt: This items will produce %s until burned
tooltip.energizedpower.lightning_generat: This block produces %s per lightning strike.
A lightning rod block must be place above this block for it to function
The charging station can be used to charge items inside a player inventory.
advancements.energizedpower.advanced_mac: More advanced machines need this base crafting item.
advancements.energizedpower.auto_crafter: Who needs manual crafting tables when this block can do it automatically?
advancements.energizedpower.basic_machin: This is the base crafting item for every basic machine.
advancements.energizedpower.basic_solar_: Your first solar cell of two required for your first solar panel.
advancements.energizedpower.battery_2.de: This battery can store as much energy as 4 Tier I batteries.
advancements.energizedpower.battery_3.de: Tier III: Twice the power of Tier II
advancements.energizedpower.battery_4.ti: You ask for even more Energy
advancements.energizedpower.battery_4.de: Well this is Tier IV - only four to go
advancements.energizedpower.battery_5.ti: The best normal copper can do
advancements.energizedpower.battery_5.de: Tier V: You will need to energize the next battery tier...
advancements.energizedpower.battery_6.de: Tier VI: You have energized your battery for even more storage capacity.
advancements.energizedpower.battery_7.ti: You said you need more Power?
advancements.energizedpower.battery_7.de: Tier VII: A quarter million FE of storage capacity! Can we do better?
advancements.energizedpower.battery_8.de: This is the best battery of this mod (It can store more than 1 million FE)
advancements.energizedpower.battery_8_fu: You have fully charged your 1 million FE battery!
advancements.energizedpower.cable_insula: Cover your cables with this ingredient. (Can be crafted by clicking on wool with shears [Dispenser can be used too])
advancements.energizedpower.charger.desc: Charge your energy items with this block.
Producing energy by burning stuff might not be the most efficient but good enough for the moment.
advancements.energizedpower.energized_co: Cable with very high Power throughput!
advancements.energizedpower.energized_po: A guide book for this mod.
advancements.energizedpower.energizedpow: This is the start of your energized power journey.
advancements.energizedpower.energizer.de: This machine can energize your copper ingots much faster and more efficient than the charger.
advancements.energizedpower.energy_analy: Analyze every energy block - even if they have no GUI interface!
advancements.energizedpower.inventory_co: Produce and distribute energy in your inventory.
advancements.energizedpower.silicon.desc: This ingredient is used in nearly all items and blocks of this mod.
advancements.energizedpower.solar_panel_: Tier II is better than Tier I
Tier III - The best of the basic solar panels
Tier IV: Only one to go!
Tier V - You have got the best solar panel!
